import Upgrades from "./Upgrades" function HelperShop({incrementDps, totalMoney, updateMoney}) { const money = totalMoney console.log(money) function purchaseHelper(cost, dps) { console.log(money,cost) if(money-cost<0) return updateMoney(cost*-1) incrementDps(dps) } return (

Helper Shop

purchaseHelper(cost, dps)} /> this.handleLuckUpgrade(cost)} /> this.handleMoneyCountUpgrade(cost)} />
) } export default HelperShop
